Use cases¶

This section contains a list and description of several use cases for the CSM.

Simple usage¶

Standard stuff for which CMS are made. web2cms must allow building all this stuff in order to be considered functional.

  • Blog
    • Needed features
  • Corporate
    • Needed features
  • Newspaper
  • E-Commerce
  • Wiki

Advanced usage¶

Advanced content management, such as geographical content (+ map rendering, etc.), social network with tons of ajax to quickly pass information around, Q&A community in StackOverflow style.

  • WebGIS
  • Social network
  • Q&A
    • Example sites
